articles.description: “I think friends can have disagreements or not see eye to eye on things.”
articles.content:
They might not agree on what direction the sport should go, but Rory McIlroy insists his relationship with Tiger Woods is perfectly fine.
McIlroy said Thursday night at the Wells Fargo Championship … [+2622 chars]
